title: Effects of weathering and simulated gastric fluid exposure on cellular responses to polystyrene particles

Liyuan Gong, Animesh Pan, Takeshi Matsuo, Hemalatha Kanniyappan, Irene Andreu, Alan Rothman, Geoffrey D. Bothun, Mathew Mathew, Yang Lin
